projects.title: Real Estate Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive property management platform featuring calendar-based booking system, automated agent email confirmations, internal blog for SEO optimization and content generation, newsletter system.
features: Calendar booking system for property viewings

projects.title: NASA Space Apps 2024 - Seismic Detection
projects.description: AI/ML-powered seismic detection system for lunar and Martian environments. Developed as part of NASA Space Apps Challenge 2024, this project uses machine learning models to analyze seismic data and detect potential moonquakes and marsquakes.
features: Machine learning model for seismic pattern recognition
Data preprocessing pipeline for space seismic data

projects.title: Cotibot
projects.description: An intelligent factory quoting system that streamlines the quotation process for manufacturing businesses. Features automated PDF generation, AFIP CUIT lookup integration for Argentine tax validation, and a comprehensive admin pricing panel.

projects.title: NASA Space Apps Rosario Winners - FarmHero
projects.description: Educational simulator that uses real NASA and CONAE satellites data to teach resource-management and sustainable agriculture decisions. Players restore degraded land by managing limited capital and choosing interventions (fertilizers, biocontrols, irrigation), whose short- and long-term effects the game simulates. Winner of NASA Space Apps Rosario 2025; currently under Global Judging.
features: Simulation of agricultural interventions (irrigation, fertilization, biocontrols) with short and long-term effects
Real data ingestion and normalization: NASA and CONAE satellite layers
Educational UI with step-by-step guidance widgets
Agricultural rules and heuristics engine (extensible with ML)
Simulation of climatic/statistical events (droughts, heat waves, floods) with probabilistic impacts on crops and resources to evaluate mitigation strategies
Prototype developed in 48 hours; continuous post-hackathon iteration

timeline.title: 2025 Global Nominees
timeline.description: Projects selected by local and universal judges to advance to global stage.

timeline.title: 2025 Global Finalists
timeline.description: Review by NASA experts and partner agencies to determine finalists and honorable mentions.

timeline.title: 2025 Global Winners
timeline.description: NASA executive committee and partners select the 10 global winners among finalists.

projects.title: Cruisely
projects.description: A comprehensive cruise booking and management platform currently in development. Features partial functionality with demo capabilities for cruise search, booking workflows, and user management systems.

projects.title: Bridgify
projects.description: A cryptocurrency swap ramp platform developed during a hackathon. Currently features mock data demonstrating the intended user flow and architecture for seamless crypto-to-fiat and fiat-to-crypto transactions.
